name: Warding: Demo
description:
"Warding: Demo" is a text based horror game where you play as Cecilia, a blind woman, on the night that her house gets broken into. There are multiple endings and the intruder of the house actually changes depending on your choices. 

Game is best played in full screen mode. 

This is a part of a bigger concept I created and is still a work in progress. 

This game was written and coded by Rachel Israel.
